thread.title: David Beckham links up with former Manchester United and England pals Gary and Phil Neville for dinner
thread.title_full: David Beckham links up with former Manchester United and England pals Gary and Phil Neville for dinner

author: Jack Rathborn
title: David Beckham links up with former Manchester United and England pals Gary and Phil Neville for dinner
text:
David Beckham links up with former Manchester United and England pals Gary and Phil Neville for dinner The former England captain and his ex-teammates sampled French cuisine on a night out Share David Beckham enjoyed a meal out with former teammates Gary and Phil Neville (Photo: Gary Neville/Instagram) Share Get Manchester United FC   Could   
David Beckham has been catching up with former Manchester United teammates Gary and Phil Neville. 
The former England internationals shared a glass of red wine whilst eating out. 
Former Valencia manager Gary also posted a snap of the table's dinner: a bowl of snails. 
The trio appear to be catching up in France, where Beckham enjoyed a brief stint with Paris Saint-Germain.
